info.message: I am available for freelance work. Connect with me via mail or call my account.

card1.title: Business Strategy
card1.description: Help you to build your business logic from scratch and upscale it.

card2.title: Mobile App
card2.description: Build modern Android and IOS apps to connect with people around you quickly.

card3.title: Web Application
card3.description: Build client-side applications with modern features like SPA and maintain semantic coding style among other best practices for SEO optimization. Use modern tech such as Angular and SCSS.

card4.title: Backend App
card4.description: Build modern and reusable APIs with help of .net core, with user security and maintainability.

card5.title: SSRS Reports
card5.description: Build a reports dashboard in modern UI with help of charts, graphs, and tables.

card6.title: Window and Console App
card6.description: Build scalable and maintainable server/windows/console applications using modern technology stacks such as MSSQL, WinForms, and ConsoleApp.

proj1.summary: Create backend for Gemapp website and mobile app using .net core. Created models, Dtos, Controllers, and Mappers and added Fluent Validation and Fluent API. Odata for Rest calls. Created logic to handle multiple database access based on assigned DB to specific users
proj1.tech: .NetCore, Odata, AutoMapper, EF, MsSQL and many more
proj1.role: Scrum Master, Sytem design and Developer

proj2.summary: Building GemApp web application, which is the modern version of B2B software DiaAdmin. with Oauth and web APIs, it uses PrimeNg as a UI framework
proj2.tech: Angular, Typescript, HTML, SCSS, PrimeNg(3rd party theme)
proj2.role: Scrum Master, Sytem design and Developer

proj3.summary: Build a Tender website, for a client, through which multiple users can perform a bidding process against items that are auctioned.
proj3.tech: Angular, Typescript, HTML, SCSS, PrimeNg(3rd party theme)

proj4.summary: Build GemApp Mobile App for B2B process for diamond trading business in android and ios, using hybrid technology.

proj5.summary: The application sends Schedule SSRS Reports to clients. Each time a new report will be generated/deploy on reporting server with different Db links and the report will be encrypted and sent to clients
proj5.tech: C#, MS SQL Server 2008/2016, SSIS, SSRS

proj6.summary: The application is used to map the same contacts from a different location with a different name to one single contact name at the global level. Which help user to manage and build more meaning full reports for their business

proj7.summary: The application helps clients to migrate from their old system to our environment. It uses Excel with the specified format as standards, it checks excel and imports client details into our system-specific environment

proj8.summary: The application helps clients to download and compare GIA/HRD/etc lab reports with their data. Update stock to Rapnet, Idex, and their website. and many more features

proj9.summary: Build multiple SSRS reports based on clients requirements. Created all kinds of SSRS reports. Use MsSQL and TSQL to fetch data.
